ModMetaData.description:
Version: 1.0.0.1\n\n# That mod aims to add some new weapons with Attachments or MultiUsages, "ancient(21st)" most. Adds several new melee weapons to take advantage of CE mechanics.# CombatExtended Only!!
# That mod aims to add some new weapons with Attachments or MultiUsages, "ancient(21st)" most
Since 20240718_20240719 1.0.0.1
- (CE Only)FNFAL + M203: Literally - (WorkInProgress)Javelin: A single use ChargeLance-like Weapon but more lethal, 100mmRHA penetration(Anti-Centipede or other Steel MegaBugs)
## QA: ## Q1: CE compatible? , A1:CE compatible, and only for CE
